title: 5 states account for over 72% of country's total active Covid-19 cases: Govt

The court also directed the state government to empanel all such private hospitals and nursing homes, who fulfil the relevant criterion prescribed by the Centre for treatment of COVID-19 suspects/patients under the Ayushman Bharat Madhya Pradesh Niramayam Yojana- he said.

title: Madhya Pradesh: Vaccines allotted for Sailana taken back to district headquarters, no vaccination now
description: From April 8, vaccination has been stopped in Sailana and nearby tribal areas. On April 7, 100 people were vaccinated and then it was announced that there would be no vaccination for the next 3-4 days.

title: 3-day lockdown imposed in Madhya Pradesh's Chhindwara as Covid cases rise
